trans-unit.source: Base type for conditions used in filtering when searching for elements in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree.
trans-unit.target: Tipo di base per condizioni utilizzate nei filtri durante la ricerca per gli elementi di [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] struttura ad albero.

trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Condition"></xref> that always evaluates to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Condition"> </xref> che valuta sempre su <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This condition exists only for symmetry with <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition>.
trans-unit.target: Questa condizione si verifica solo per simmetria con <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition>

trans-unit.source: It will never enable a match with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements, and it cannot usefully be combined with any other condition.
trans-unit.target: Non consentir√† mai una corrispondenza con [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elementi e utile non possono essere combinati con qualsiasi altra condizione.

trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Condition"></xref> that always evaluates to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Condition"> </xref> che valuta sempre su <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
